plugin.name: linkedin
plugin.description: Access LinkedIn profile, create posts, manage connections, and interact with your professional network
plugin.context: Use for professional networking, sharing content, retrieving profile information, posting updates, accessing organization data, and managing LinkedIn connections and posts

get_profile.description: Retrieve authenticated user's LinkedIn profile information
get_profile.usage_context: Use when you need to access the user's basic LinkedIn profile data including name, headline, profile picture, and unique identifier

projection.description: Optional projection fields (e.g., 'id,firstName,lastName,profilePicture'). If not specified, returns all available fields.

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required 'profile' scope. Please reconnect with full permissions.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
common_errors.profile_not_found: Profile not found or access denied.

get_user_info.description: Get user information via OpenID Connect (email, name, picture, locale)
get_user_info.usage_context: Use when you need the user's email address, verified status, profile picture URL, or locale information using OpenID Connect standard

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required 'openid' scope. Please reconnect with OpenID Connect permissions.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.

create_post.description: Create and publish a post on LinkedIn with text and optional media
create_post.usage_context: Use when you want to share content, updates, articles, or media on the user's LinkedIn feed. Supports text posts up to 3000 characters with optional visibility settings.

text.description: The text content of the post. Maximum 3000 characters.

visibility.description: Post visibility setting. 'PUBLIC' makes it visible to everyone, 'CONNECTIONS' limits it to 1st-degree connections.

media_url.description: Optional URL to share as an article or link preview

media_title.description: Optional title for the shared media/article

media_description.description: Optional description for the shared media/article

max_text_length.message: Post text cannot exceed 3000 characters. Please shorten your message.

public_visibility.message: This post will be visible to everyone on LinkedIn. Proceed?

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing 'w_member_social' scope required to create posts. Please reconnect with posting permissions.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait before posting again.
common_errors.invalid_content: Post content violates LinkedIn's content policy or contains invalid characters.
common_errors.duplicate_post: This post appears to be a duplicate. LinkedIn prevents posting identical content within a short time period.

get_posts.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's published LinkedIn posts
get_posts.usage_context: Use when you need to fetch the user's post history, analyze their content, or display their recent LinkedIn activity

count.description: Number of posts to retrieve (1-50). Default is 10.

sort_by.description: Sort order for posts. LAST_MODIFIED shows recently edited posts first.

max_count.message: Cannot retrieve more than 50 posts per request. Please use pagination or reduce the count.

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing 'r_member_social' scope required to read posts. Please reconnect with read permissions.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
common_errors.no_posts_found: No posts found for this user.

get_organization.description: Get detailed information about a LinkedIn organization/company page
get_organization.usage_context: Use when you need company information such as name, logo, location, industry, employee count, or other organization details

organization_id.description: The LinkedIn organization ID (numeric) or vanity name

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.organization_not_found: Organization not found. Check the organization ID or vanity name.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing required permissions to access organization data.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.

search_organizations.description: Search for LinkedIn organizations by keywords, industry, or company size
search_organizations.usage_context: Use when you need to find companies matching specific criteria. Note: This endpoint requires LinkedIn Partner Program approval and may be restricted.

keywords.description: Search keywords (company name or related terms)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50)

max_results.message: Cannot return more than 50 results per search. Please refine your search criteria.

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: This endpoint requires LinkedIn Partner Program approval. Your application may not have access.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
common_errors.no_results: No organizations found matching your search criteria.
common_errors.partner_access_required: Organization search requires Partner Program approval from LinkedIn. Contact LinkedIn Developer Relations.

get_organization_posts.description: Retrieve posts published by a LinkedIn organization/company page
get_organization_posts.usage_context: Use when you need to fetch posts from a company page. Requires admin access to the organization or appropriate permissions.

count.description: Number of posts to retrieve (1-100). Default is 10.

max_count.message: Cannot retrieve more than 100 posts per request for organizations.

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Missing 'r_organization_social' scope or you must be an admin of this organization.
common_errors.organization_not_found: Organization ID not found. Verify the organization exists.
common_errors.admin_access_required: You must have admin access to this organization to retrieve its posts.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
common_errors.no_posts_found: No posts found for this organization.

get_connections.description: Get the authenticated user's 1st-degree LinkedIn connections
get_connections.usage_context: Use when you need to access the user's professional network. Note: This endpoint requires LinkedIn Partner Program approval and may be restricted.

count.description: Number of connections to retrieve per page (1-50). Default and recommended maximum is 50.

max_count.message: Cannot retrieve more than 50 connections per request. LinkedIn recommends a maximum of 50.

common_errors.auth_failed: LinkedIn connection expired. Please reconnect in Settings.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: This endpoint requires LinkedIn Partner Program approval. Your application may not have access to the Connections API.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: LinkedIn API rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
common_errors.partner_access_required: Connections API requires Partner Program approval from LinkedIn. Contact LinkedIn Developer Relations.
common_errors.no_connections: No connections found or connection list is private.
